label: 蔵人
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: An official of fifth or sixth rank, responsible to the Chamberlains’ Office (Kurōdodokoro) and under the supervision of two Secretaries (Kurōdo no Tō) of somewhat higher rank.  A Chamberlain was admitted to the privy chamber and had direct access to the Emperor; he was also allowed to wear colours and fabrics normally forbidden to a man of his rank.[蔵人所、蔵人頭][RK]
